Sentencas: Ionic conductivity along strained heterostructural interfaces can be enhanced by several orders of magnitude due to lattice mismatch.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution at strained crystal interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Although extensive experimental and theoretical investigations have been focused on the correlation between lattice strain and ionic conductivity, exact depth profiles of ionic conductivity are still lacking.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution at strained crystal interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: In this report, we develop, for the first time, an exact model for investigating the depth evolution of ionic conductivity enhancement as induced by interfacial lattice strain in SOFCs.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution at strained crystal interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The model allows for analytically evaluating the correlation between lattice strain and ionic conductivity enhancement in isotropic orthorhombic lattice.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution at strained crystal interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: In particular, temperature, Young's modulus, Poisson's ratio and lattice constant are incorporated into our analysis, the validity of which has been verified with prototype ionic conductors including YSZ, STO, CeO, etc. (C) 2016 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution at strained crystal interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs)
